body_html: Just want to clarify: I didn’t mean that I think this should be in core. Just that from me as a user’s perspective, this will save me some trouble because I once needed it and wouldn’t have to implement it myself if it were in core. A lot of things are like this (depending whether I happen to use them in my research) but not necesarily that we should put them in core.

body: Just want to clarify: I didn’t mean that I think this should be in core. Just that from me as a user’s perspective, this will save me some trouble because I once needed it and wouldn’t have to implement it myself if it were in core. A lot of things are like this (depending whether I happen to use them in my research) but not necesarily that we should put them in core.
